column4: you can list open files with   lsof   but it shows hundreds... maybe  you can grep it  such as      lsof  |  grep config.dat     ???

i've fixed it before it's bugging me that I can't find the answer again..   I think there is a lock file that is created when you open synaptic that stops you running apt-get at same time etc... if you delete the lock file as root it works
all the searches so far have given previous advice
when i find the file i will

be careful deleting files as root lol..  it's a very specific file
